tool_description: Movies And Serials Torrent is a web-service that let you access movies and serials and its torrent that available on YTS.mx  and Oneom.is. You can search movies/serials, get latest movies/serials, get movies/serials details, etc.
name: Movies and Serials Torrent
title: Movies and Serials Torrent

api_list.name: search a tvShow or serial
api_list.description: this endpoint will search a tvShow or serial with title
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-and-serials-torrent.p.rapidapi.com/tv_shows/search/Loki"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-and-serials-torrent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-and-serials-torrent.p.rapidapi.com/tv_shows/search/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-and-serials-torrent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get all the episode details of a show
api_list.description: this endpoint will get all the episode details with/without torrent of a given tv show episode id

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-and-serials-torrent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get movies by genre
api_list.description: this endpoint will get a list of movies for the given genre.  You can find the list of genre at [IMDB](http://www.imdb.com/genre/)
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-and-serials-torrent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
